Ever Heard Of A Pre-Birthday Party For A 2-YO? Well, Taimur Just Had A Fancy One And We're Not Surprised
Ever Heard Of A Pre-Birthday Party For A 2-YO? Well, Taimur Just Had A Fancy One And We're Not Surprised
Internet's favourite kid Taimur is all set to turn 2 on December 20th but the celebrations have already begun for the family. Mom Kareena and Daddy Saif hosted a pre-birthday bash for Tim in Mumbai last evening.
Present at the celebrations were aunts Karisma Kapoor and Soha Ali Khan Pataudi, grandmother Babita Kapoor, and cousins Kiaan Raj Kapur, Samaira Kapur, and Inaaya Naumi Kemmu, Kunal Kemmu, Amrita Arora Ladak and Tushar Kapoor’s son Laksshya Kapoor.
The pictures that made way to the internet prove that the celebrations were exotic and grand in every sense of the word. Have a look at the pictures.
Don't Miss 707 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES
Reports claim that the family will ring in Taimur's second birthday party in South Africa.
title: Ever Heard Of A Pre-Birthday Party For A 2-YO? Well, Taimur Just Had A Fancy One And We're Not Surprised
